events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I ordered.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 123456, and I have attached a picture showing the item I received instead of the one I ordered.
We have verified the issue and will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate your quick assistance and the prompt refund. Thank you for resolving my issue efficiently.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need any more help.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Since your refund was received and no further concerns were reported, we are closing your support case now. Thank you.
